data.title: Anno 1800â„¢ Console Edition
data.meta_description: Welcome to the dawn of the Industrial Age. Experience one of the most exciting and fast-changing periods in a rich city-building experience!
data.text:
Build Your Own Empire

Anno 1800 allows you to construct large Metropoles, managing a thriving economy, and protecting your creations from others.

To guide the cities to prosperity, you will need to learn to adapt to any situation that arises.

Anno 1800 provides players ample opportunity to prove skills as you can create huge cities, plan logistic networks, settle lush new continents, send out expeditions around the globe, and dominate opponents by diplomacy, trade, or warfare.

Enjoy a Unique City-Builder Experience

Anno 1800 includes a story-based campaign, customizable sandbox mode, and an exciting multiplayer experience.

You decide what you want your game to be: by challenging yourself with a variety of AI Characters or by focusing on beautifying a huge empire.

New Features for a New Age

Discover the rich city-building traditions of the Anno brand!

Guide your cities to prosperity and discover ambitious features through different expeditions. Send crews of specialists to seek fame and fortune across the globe.

The workforce feature will make the management of your factories more demanding and realistic than ever!

Building tips

Welcome back!

It's time to build a whole city and production chains.

It takes all kinds to make a world: artisans, engineers, farmers, public services, citizens, investors,...

Diplomacy and trade

Get ready to know the secrets of Anno 1800 in terms of trade and diplomacy...

Choose between a passive trade or declare war to triumph? Well, that's up to you!

Beautify your empire

Do you need help to color, decorate and bring harmony to your cities?

This video tells you all the possibilities...

Discover all cosmetic packs that will allow you to make your city come to life!

The creativity will have no limits.
